metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46316 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In buc Traceroute 2.0.12 through 2.1.2 before 2.1.3, the wrapper scripts do not properly parse command lines.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46316` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

traceroute - 1:2.1.0-2ubuntu0.20.04.1~esm1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: traceroute package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.1.0-2ubuntu0.20.04.1~esm1').
